on.from sentence: We observe that SCIBERT outperforms BERT-Base on scientific tasks (+2.11 F1 with finetuning and +2.43 F1 without).
We observe that SCIBERT outperforms BERT-Base on biomedical tasks (+1.92 F1 with finetuning and +3.59 F1 without).

achieves.from sentence: In addition, SCIBERT achieves new SOTA results on BC5CDR and ChemProt (Lee et al., 2019), and EBMNLP (Nye et al., 2018).

outperforms.from sentence: Interesting, SCIBERT outperforms BIOBERT results on BC5CDR and ChemProt, and performs similarly on JNLPBA despite being trained on a substantially smaller biomedical corpus.

on: NER part of SciERC (Luan et al., 2018)

achieves.from sentence: In addition, SCIBERT achieves new SOTA results on ACL-ARC (Cohan et al., 2019), and the NER part of SciERC (Luan et al., 2018).

on.from sentence: We observe that SCIBERT outperforms BERT-Base on the multidomain tasks (+0.49 F1 with finetuning and +0.93 F1 without)

outperforms.from sentence: In addition, SCIBERT outperforms the SOTA on SciCite (Cohan et al., 2019).
